Module org.microbean.interceptor

Package org.microbean.interceptor

package org.microbean.interceptor
Provides classes and interfaces related to implementing interceptors.
Author:
Laird Nelson
  • Class
    Description
    Chain
    A Callable InvocationContext.
    ConstantDescs
    A utility class containing useful ConstantDescs.
    InterceptorBinding<V>
    A Binding used to qualify objects.
    InterceptorBindings<V>
    An immutable Bindings containing InterceptorBinding instances.
    InterceptorException
    A RuntimeException indicating that an error has occurred while setting up an interception chain.
    InterceptorFunction
    An interface whose implementations perform interceptions.
    Prioritized
    An interface indicating that its implementations can supply an int indicating a relative priority (smallest number wins; "quality is job one"; "first place"; "X is your first priority").
    Prioritized.Comparator
    A Comparator that compares priorities.
